name: Intro
_source: narrate;Narrator;Aurelia's northern forces have been crippled.
narrate;Narrator;Talia fell, Xeconis injured, and many other lives lost.
narrate;Narrator;While Sages hides in the countryside following his victory...
narrate;Narrator;Max and Pit take their friend home, to Glaceil.
narrate;Narrator;The pair help Xeconis recuperate from his injuries.
narrate;Narrator;Meanwhile, Queen Emeline hears rumours regarding her Uncle in the north.
narrate;Narrator;So, she heads to Glaceil to gather information on any shady business.
speak;Max;Buddy... you're going to be alright...|We've still got so much to do!
speak;Pit;That was terrifying!|Still, I wish I could have done more...
speak;Xeconis;Prince Sages has mounted a powerful offense.
speak;Max;King Oberon of Monsdor and her Majesty...
speak;Xeconis;They just want more fuel on the fire.|More bodies to pile high... Talia's included.
speak;Pit;She wanted you to live above all else...
speak;Xeconis;I'm not proud of it either, I stood too stubbornly.|Digging in my heels was the wrong move.
speak;Max;Your Majesty...{c:wait;200} and Sir Skill?|At this hour, you're far too late to help anyone, Sir.
speak;Skill;Dastard! You know I wanted no more of this than anyone!
speak;Skill;But, they failed! They have no room to talk!
speak;Max;Yeah, yeah...{c:wait;400} Your Majesty, what do you wish to talk to us about?
speak;Emeline;My Uncle...{c:wait;300}he was there, was he not?
speak;Max;At the battle? Sure, he didn't stick around for too long.|Clearly doesn't value his fellow countrymen, perhaps we were too common.
speak;Emeline;Did he... mention anything about me?|About... the throne?
speak;Max;I didn't speak to him personally.|The person who did, is among the dead.
speak;Emeline;Very well, that's all I wished to know.
speak;Pit;V-very well? It isn't well at all!|D-do you have no heart?!
speak;Skill;Cur! How dare you insult her Majesty!|You may join the dead if you so wish!
speak;Skill;Your Majesty, he didn't mean it!|Right?{c:bop_portrait;Skill} Right?
speak;Max;Hang on, you came all this way... in the late hours...|Just to inquire about Prince Lucian?
speak;Max;Well, everything's making less and less sense...
speak;Emeline;The light hasn't reached your eyes, it's alright...
speak;Emeline;My apologies, I grow tired...|My thoughts are all over the place...
speak;Skill;Right away, your Majesty!|We must head home with haste! Farewell, men.
speak;Max;Really? This late?|You ought to stay, the wild is dangerous at night.
speak;Emeline;Ah, thank you for the gracious offer...
speak;Skill;The village is rather, austere, for her Majesty.
speak;Skill;We did see a campsite on the way here...|I wonder if the campers are alright.
speak;Pit;Campers? Oh no!|They'll be dog food soon!
speak;Emeline;I must help my subjects... even at the expense of losing sleep.
speak;Morshu;Wolves? Defeat them! Shoo them, now!
speak;Morshu;How meddlesome, these wolves best not ruin everything...
speak;Emeline;I can barely see a thing...
speak;Max;Sure you're up for it, your Majesty?
speak;Emeline;Do not insult me! Of course I am!
speak;Pit;They're out there in the fog...
